DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Alzheimer 's Prevention Registry GeneMatch program identify large group people interested participate research study clinical trial base part genetic background . This genetic information use match interested individual study , provide recruitment resource Alzheimer 's scientific community . Interested individual visit www.endALZnow.org/GeneMatch join GeneMatch program .
DOC.brief_title: GeneMatch : A Program Alzheimer 's Prevention Registry Match Individuals Studies Based Apolipoprotein E ( APOE ) Genotype
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective Alzheimer 's Prevention Registry GeneMatch program ( 1 ) identify characterize large cohort people interested , may eligible participate , current future preclinical Alzheimer 's disease research study clinical trial base genetic background , ( 2 ) provide information individual research study may eligible , base part genetic background . Cognitively unimpaired individual age 55 75 , inclusive , eligible enroll GeneMatch . GeneMatch provide participant genetic sample kit ( cheek swab ) test specific gene call apolipoproteins E ( APOE ) . GeneMatch disclose result APOE test participant . GeneMatch may use APOE test result match participant research study . Participants obligation pursue study opportunity .
DOC.criteria: Age 5575 , inclusive Provide basic demographic , medical history , contact information Consent APOE genotyping without receive result Live United States Unable comply project 's protocol requirement Selfreported diagnosis dementia objective cognitive impairment syndrome
